DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesized that early applied pulsed electromagnetic field treatment on delayed union might lead to increased rate of fracture union and shortened period of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Early Application of Pulsed Electromagnetic Field in the Treatment of Postoperative Delayed Union
DOC.criteria: The failure of healing after at least 16 weeks and not more than 9 months following surgical reduction and fixation of the fracture. Implant loosening or failure, infection, established nonunion, fracture gap greater than 5 mm, presence of implant within the fracture gap, metabolic disorders or received medication affecting fracture healing
